author: Niel Curley
text:
In Big Ideas Rollins states young professionals are motivated to local government because it allows them to serve their communities and see the fruits of their labor.  What are the next steps your community is taking to keep and prepare young professionals to fill upper management roles?
” In the short essays that we received, the answers to why they chose this specific career track are markedly similar and embrace two common themes: community and service. These two words—service and community—have been, and continue to be, the primary motivating force behind choosing a career in local government.”
